name: Dead Body Killer
description:
If you want to feel like a survivor of the zombie Apocalypse and have fun killing time and a couple of hundred zombies, then Dead Body Killer game is for you!

Dead Body Killer-a shooting range with a top view, where the player acts as a fighter of the dead. The player's task is to fight off all the waves of approaching zombies and save the survivors. As you progress through the levels, new types of zombies will appear, faster and more dodgy.
The game is based on quick reaction, care and accuracy.
Destroy all the dead, good luck!

You will find: 20 levels with a gradual increase in complexity, fun pixel graphics, 3 locations, a dozen varieties of zombies.
